Class BigTwo

java.lang.Object
BigTwo
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardGame
public class BigTwo extends Object implements CardGame
The BigTwo class implements the CardGame interface and is used to model a Big Two card game.
Author:
Davinne Valeria

      Parameters:
      playerIdx - index of the active player in playerList

    • composeHand

      public static Hand composeHand(CardGamePlayer player, CardList cards)
      A method for returning a valid hand from the specified list of cards of the player.
      Parameters:
      player - current active player
      cards - list of cards being played
      Returns:
      a Hand object which specify the type of combination formed by the cards (e.g. Single, FullHouse, etc.)
